info.s1products.server.device

クラス DeviceMessageReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.s1products.server.device.DeviceMessageReceiver

  • public abstract class DeviceMessageReceiver
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provided receive device message core functions. To implement own message receiver, extend this abstract class.

    [ Feature list ]

    • Hold device driver properties
    • Add message queue to NotificationRouter queue
    • Notify message received event

    作成者:
    Shuichi Miura

    • メソッドの詳細

      • onInitialize

        protected abstract boolean onInitialize(java.util.Properties prop)
        Initialize device driver
        パラメータ:
        prop - Settings for driver
        戻り値:
        True is success. False is fail.

      • onClose

        protected abstract boolean onClose()
        Closing device driver

      • getRouter

        public NotificationPacketRouter getRouter()
        Get notification router
        戻り値:
        Notification router

      • setRouter

        public void setRouter(NotificationPacketRouter router)
        Set notification router
        パラメータ:
        router - notification router

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Determine whether this receiver state is active or stopped
        戻り値:
        True: active, False: stopped

      • getDriverProperties

        public java.util.Properties getDriverProperties()
        Get device driver properties object
        戻り値:
        Device driver properties

      • setDriverProperties

        public void setDriverProperties(java.util.Properties driverProp)
        Set device driver properties object. Need restart receiver to reflect properties.
        パラメータ:
        driverProp - Device driver properties

      • addListener

        public void addListener(MessageReceivedListener listener)
        Add message received listener. This listener will be called when receiver receive message from device.
        パラメータ:
        listener - Message received listener

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(MessageSendedListener listener)
        Remove message received listener.
        パラメータ:
        listener - Target listener

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(int index)
        Remove message received listener.
        パラメータ:
        index - Target index

      • removeAllListener

        public void removeAllListener()
        Remove all message received listeners.

      • getMessageReceivedListenerList

        public java.util.List<MessageReceivedListener> getMessageReceivedListenerList()
        Get all message received listeners.
        戻り値:
        Message received listeners

      • openReceiver

        public boolean openReceiver()
        Open device message receiver
        戻り値:
        True: Opened, False: Failed to open

      • closeReceiver

        public boolean closeReceiver()
        Close device message receiver
        戻り値:
        True: Closed, False: Failed to close

      • notifyReceivedEvent

        protected void notifyReceivedEvent(Message message)
        Notify device message received event
        パラメータ:
        message - Device message
